duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the integrity of data reported into the clinical database system and ensure it meets quality standards and regulatory requirements.
Lead end-to-end delivery of data management services and collaborate in multidisciplinary teams for clinical trials.
Provide training, mentorship, and guidance to other members of the Data Management team.
Create, review, and revise training materials, SOPs, and process/procedural guidelines.
Lead more complex studies and programs with minimal guidance and ensure on-time delivery of all study deliverables.
Maintain metric reporting tools and dashboards, oversee all clinical data management activities, and manage Sponsor contact for data management processes.
Build and maintain positive and collaborative relationships with internal and external project teams and provide high-level customer service.
Maintain data management documents, perform data cleaning, and generate, resolve, and track queries to address discrepant data.
Assess project activities for issues or risks and escalate accordingly to management, ensuring adherence to all required training.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Science, or related field with 3-4 years industry experience required (2-3 years direct CDM Lead experience)
